1486780.name: The Button Witch - Art and Guide Book
1486780.description:
All the secrets and lore of The Button Witch revealed and bundled with tons of beautiful illustrations and sketches!

This DLC is both a guide (for all achievements, quests and endings) as well as a full artbook that will teach you everything you need and want to know about the world of Ellen Button and Lord Thimble.
Includes:
- Introduction
- Characters: artwork and description
- Full Walkthrough with Achievement List, Doll and Candle location.
- Sketches and extra artwork

Enjoy!
